post.title: panasonic g10 now has iplayer :)
post.content: i didnt even know till i retuned to a london postcode, got more hd channels now and also noticed that with the ethernet (internet cable) connected it even has bbc iplayer. i didnt know, so thats a bonus hope that helps anyone else like me who hasnt even checked for ages if it was up and running yet, well i can confirm it is p.s sorry to bore all the people that already knew, lol.
